item.title: Managing Dotfiles Like a Pro
item.author: edwinkamaumuraya0@outlook.com (Eduuh Muraya)
item.description: A simpler way to manage your dotfiles Hello am edd I have been having trouble with configuration since i started using docker for my development. For consistecy and time saving , i decided it would be great to manage my dotfiles using git and github and when creating new enviroments. I wrote the solution in this post, for easy reference if i need to in the future. What a dotfile Dotfile are file in the linux system that starts with a period.
item.dc:creator: Eduuh Muraya

item.title: JavaScript Algorithm and Data Structures
item.author: edwinkamaumuraya0@outlook.com (Eduuh Muraya)
item.description: Algorithms What makes an algorithm fast? To answer this question, it tend to be grouped in two categories. With respect to input size and also assuming the worst case scenario. Time complexity Space Comlexity Time complexity Here we answer the question of how many primitive operations are executed?
